com.robodoot.dr.RoboApp

Class PololuHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.robodoot.dr.RoboApp.PololuHandler

  • public class PololuHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    A low-level (compared to PololuVirtualCat) class for interacting with the Pololu. Uses a MaestroSSC object to send commands.
